name: pota(t[o])
description:
explore the looming garden and produce potats; manipulate the ever-changing ecosystem!! 

can you grow the fastest potat in town???? try not to fall in the void! (the void is the deep dithered blue at the bottom half of the screen[it is said that anything that enters - never returns,,,,])

controls: z/x to start, arrow keys to move, z to pickup &/or harvest

made for low effort jam12 !!
